item.title: State Songs
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Through an odd series of questions about U.S. states at work the idea came up about states having songs, the same way that The Star-Spangled Banner is the U.S. national anthem. One of my co-workers mentioned that there were, so I did a little research. According to 50states.com we do indeed have state songs. The […]
item.content:encoded:
Through an odd series of questions about U.S. states at work the idea came up about states having songs, the same way that The Star-Spangled Banner is the U.S. national anthem. One of my co-workers mentioned that there were, so I did a little research. According to 50states.com we do indeed have state songs. The state song of California is I Love You California.

I learned something new today.
